item.title: ‘Foundation’ Renewed for Season 4 at Apple TV+
item.description: The sci-fi series is set to go back into production in early 2026.

item.title: ‘Foundation’ Renewed for Season 4 at Apple TV+
item.description: The sci-fi series is set to go back into production in early 2026.

item.title: ‘Foundation’ Renewed for Season 4 at Apple TV+ Ahead of Season 3 Finale
item.description: Apple TV+ has renewed the sci-fi epic “Foundation” for Season 4, Variety has learned. News of the renewal comes one day ahead of the third season finale, which drops on Apple TV+ on Sept.
